channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
I need to have a client, with changable ports, however my computer doesn't have one, and I don't think I can download anything anymore due to the computer's diskspace problem. I was wondering if anyone knew how to change the port manualy in the .JAVA Files, and then go on the server without having to download a totally different client.
I am using a basic 508 Localhost Client.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

zinkkyz:

want a port??? use uTorrent!! or u can port forward in no-ip

No-ip does not support Port Forwarding, I believe. I may look into that.
Someone feel free to correct me if I’m wrong.

Read full topic
